name: JavaScript/Node.js
prompt_template:
This is a JavaScript/Node.js project.

Project Structure:
- Uses npm/package.json for dependencies
- Main entry point: index.js (or specified in package.json)
- Install dependencies: npm install
- Run with: npm start or node index.js

When implementing:
- Follow Node.js best practices
- Use ES6+ syntax
- Structure code in modules
- Include proper error handling
- Add dependencies to package.json
